title: Bug 19981Problems with accelerators in emacs mode
description: Build 20020611 + latest org.eclipse.ui changes switch to emacs key bindings open a text file, e.g. Test.javaMany menu items have incorrect accelerator text.This is a regression.This worked properly in 20020611 (mostly, see below).File menu: Close  has Ctrl+X Ctrl+K but is missing Ctrl+F4 Save  missing Ctrl+X Ctrl+S Save All (not a problem, but could use Ctrl+X S, like Epsilon) Print  shows Ctrl+P even though this is bound to previous lineEdit menu: Undo and Redo are blank Cut, Copy, Paste, Delete, Select All, Find have default accelerator textIn 20020611, there are different problems: Project / Rebuild All shows Ctrl+B even though it's bound to back character.In 20020611+latest, it is blank (correct). Debug actions Run to Line, Run Snippet, Display, Inspect show wrongaccelerator text
